class.description: Provides data for the Chilkat.Zip's OnFileUnzipped event.

property.name: Abort
property.descrip: Set to _TRUE_ to abort the unzip.

property.name: CompressedSize
property.descrip: The compressed size of the file just unzipped.

property.name: FileName
property.descrip: The name of the file just unzipped.

property.name: FileSize
property.descrip: The uncompressed size of the file just unzipped.

property.name: IsDirectory
property.descrip: _TRUE_ if the zip entry just unzipped is a directory.
